casebody.data:
HOME SAVINGS BANK
v.
COLONIAL AMERICAN. No. 505P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 3, 2005. James G. Exum, Jr., T. Keith Black, Greensboro, Thomas S. Schaufelberger, Washington, DC, for Colonial American Casualty. David L. Brown, Esq., Greensboro, for Home Savings Bank, et al. Michael T. Wood, for Surety Association of America.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of October 2004 by Surety Association of America for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of February 2005."
